reviews.text: 3644 W Pioneer Pkwy, Arlington, TX 76013 Cedar vs composite decking DFW - Expert guidance on cedar natural beauty versus composite low maintenance options at DeckMasters. 50 years experience helping DFW homeowners choose perfect decking materials for Texas climate.
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.

"We are very happy with the service we received and the outcome of the build!" "There were delays due to weather but it was totally worth the wait." "The design included built in benches, one of the benches was noticeable warped."

My child bride and I enjoyed being in the backyard more than just about any other place on earth.  Though we had only a poured concrete patio (that came with the house) and a table and chairs set with adjustable umbrella, we had talked for … More Response from the owner a month ago Thank you so much Robin for sharing your experience and for the kind words about Deck Masters and the team. It was wonderful to hear that you're enjoying your new extended patio and that you're happy with the results.

Blake Stewart took my ideas, and brought them to life. We are thrilled with our new, badly needed, patio cover! It is beautiful and really improved the amount of shade in our backyard. I got several bids before we chose DeckMasters. Response from the owner a month ago Thank you so much Terry for sharing your experience and for the kind words about Deck Masters and the team. It was wonderful to hear that you're enjoying your new extended patio and that you're happy with the results. Your recommendation really means a lot. Thank you!
